com.unimelb.swen30006.mailroom

Class StorageBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.unimelb.swen30006.mailroom.StorageBox

  • public class StorageBox
extends java.lang.Object
    A storage box to be used by the mail storage system, created with a fixed length and methods to add and remove MailItems from the storage box. Will throw a MailOverflowException if attempted to fit above the limit. Also supports querying if a package will fit in the box.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StorageBox.Summary
      The summary class for all Storage Boxes

      The maximum size of this box

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addItem(MailItem item)
      Add a mail item to the box, throwing a MailOverflowException if the item will not fit in this box.
      boolean canHold(MailItem item)
      Checks if this mail storage box can hold the given MailItem based on its remaining capacity
      StorageBox.Summary generateSummary(java.lang.String id)
      Generate a summary object for use in planning storage and delivery
      boolean isEmpty()
      Check if the storage box is empty.
      int numPackages()
      Return the number of items stored in the mail box (whole packages, not unit size)
      MailItem popItem()
      Remove an item (without deciding which item) from the box, updating the remaining capacity

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public void addItem(MailItem item)
             throws MailOverflowException
        Add a mail item to the box, throwing a MailOverflowException if the item will not fit in this box.
        Parameters:
        item - the mail item to add to the box
        Throws:
        MailOverflowException - if there are no spaces remaining for new items in the box

      • popItem

        public MailItem popItem()
                 throws BoxEmptyException
        Remove an item (without deciding which item) from the box, updating the remaining capacity
        Returns:
        The mail item removed from the box
        Throws:
        BoxEmptyException - if there is no items in the box

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Check if the storage box is empty.
        Returns:
        true if the box is empty

      • canHold

        public boolean canHold(MailItem item)
        Checks if this mail storage box can hold the given MailItem based on its remaining capacity
        Parameters:
        item - the item you want to store in the box
        Returns:
        true if the item will fit

      • numPackages

        public int numPackages()
        Return the number of items stored in the mail box (whole packages, not unit size)
        Returns:
        the number of mail items in this box

      • generateSummary

        public StorageBox.Summary generateSummary(java.lang.String id)
        Generate a summary object for use in planning storage and delivery
        Parameters:
        id - the id assigned in the storage system to this box
        Returns:
        a summary of the box
